com.github.lb.stindex.dimension

Class BasicDimensionDefinition

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.tm.stindex.dimension.BasicDimensionDefinition
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NumericDimensionDefinition, Persistable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UnboundedDimensionDefinition

    public class BasicDimensionDefinition
extends java.lang.Object
implements NumericDimensionDefinition
    The Basic Dimension Definition class defines a Space Filling Curve dimension as a minimum and maximum range with values linearly interpolated within the range. Values outside of the range will be clamped within the range.
